pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Finac Enterprise Serverhttps://www.altertech.com/products/fes/Configuration example:```yamlfes: key: secret real-ip-header: X-Real-IP finac: db: postgresql://finac:PASSWORD@HOST/finac db-pool-size: 30 redis-host: localhost multiplier: 1000 restrict-deletion: 1 lazy-exchange: false rate-allow-reverse: true rate-allow-cross: true base-asset: EUR gunicorn: listen: 0.0.0.0:8832 #gunicorn: gunicorn3 pid-file: /tmp/fes.pid start-failed-after: 5 force-stop-after: 10 launch-debug: true extra-options: -w 2 --log-file /var/log/fes/fes.log --log-level INFO -u fes```
